contentList.content: Sharpshooter: Sniper Shot

Ranged weapon attacks with two-handed weapons you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with add your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> as a damage bonus, but cost an additional [1] movement points.
Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> as a damage bonus.

Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules.

Ranged weapon attacks with two-handed weapons you are Proficient with add your Dexterity Modifier as a damage bonus, but cost an additional Movement points. You can toggle this on or off.
When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance also increases by 50%.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for Deception and Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
You have become a true thespian. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for Deception and Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Heavy Armour.
Reduce incoming damage from non-magical attacks by [1].
Incoming damage from non-magical attacks decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Medium Armour and shields.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="MusicalInstrumentProficiency">Musical Instrument Proficiency</LSTag>.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in chosen Ability's <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with four weapons of your choice.
Protects from critical hits. Also you regain full <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> when you <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Abnormal Obstinacy

The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> reduces by 1 every time you attack the same target in melee. You should not use <LSTag Tooltip="TwoHanded">Two-Handed</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> weapon holding it in two hands. The effect lasts until you roll Critical Hit or your turn ends. Stacks up to 5 times.
This creature is a target of Abnormal Obstinacy.

Once per combat, when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or kill a target with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attack</LSTag>, you can make another melee weapon attack as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.

When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action.

Attacks with melee weapons you are Proficient with, and are wielding in both hands, can deal an additional 6 damage at the cost of a -3 Attack Roll penalty. You can toggle this on and off.
You take a -3 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> you make with Heavy melee weapons.
Melee Attack Bonus: -3
You have a +6 bonus to damage rolls you make with Heavy melee weapons.
Melee Damage Bonus: +6
Ambidextrous
Once per turn after making an offhand melee attack can make an additional one for free.
Ambidextrous - Offhand Extra Attack
Duelist Mage
You can cast a cantrip (except Eldritch Blast) as a bonus action after making a melee attack with weapon you are proficient with. Your left hand should be free.
You can cast a cantrip (except Eldritch Blast) as a bonus action.
